queries.query: SELECT TOP 100 qs.last_execution_time, qs.total_worker_time, qs.last_worker_time, qs.min_worker_time, qs.max_worker_time, qs.total_elapsed_time, qs.last_elapsed_time, qs.min_elapsed_time, qs.max_elapsed_time, qs.total_clr_time, qs.last_clr_time, qs.min_clr_time, qs.max_clr_time, qs.total_rows, qs.min_rows, qs.max_rows FROM sys.dm_exec_query_stats qs CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(qs.plan_handle) st CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_query_plan(qs.plan_handle) qp WHERE qs.execution_count > 1 AND qs.total_clr_time > 0 ORDER BY qs.total_clr_time DESC;
